posts.post_content:
Offered for sale here are two very nice colored silks both graded by 3.5 by SGC
The first one is Kling which is green with dark rust color ink printing. It displays nicely with little fraying. The Turkey Red Cigarettes printed neatly on the bottom with the factory designation on the top
The second is HOF Fred Clarke . This is also a green silk with bright blue printing that really pops. This also has minimal fraying with the Old Mill ad and factory designation easily visible. Shipping is free with paypal f & F. Add 4.00 per item for tracking. 
Kling  $66.00
Clarke $120.00
Bump for silks. Clarke has beautiful contrast
